channel.title: (Playtesting Weekend) Vigilance Fantasy RPG
channel.description:
Part man. Part myth. All Law.
Inspired by mythology and Robocop, Vigilance is an RPG about Living Laws in a Post-Bronze Age Collapsed Fantasy World.
Pregenerated characters and their province will be supplied.
**Note:** Playtesting of resolution mechanics—looking for testers who understand dice pools and probability.
This event is scheduled to run for 2 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2022-02-26 time=19:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2022-02-26 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] (https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-MrtGJm5wMijeQem8dFD)

Inspired by mythology and Robocop, Vigilance is an RPG about Living Laws in a Post-Bronze Age Collapsed Fantasy World.
